summary: Adds herds of wild horses into the landscape of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
BASIC DESCRIPTION
This is a ModBox mod, produced by a ModBox member, who is affiliated with the ModBox group.

This mod adds roaming wild horses to Skyrim, in herds. 

These horses are very protective, and will defend their patch. This provides an immersive natural experience to the player. 

It is still in early beta, and will be updated regularly, notably, with extra new species and textures. Any constructive criticisms will be happily accepted, and dealt with in a later update. Report bugs in the comment section. Any decent photos you produce of this mod will be gratefully accepted.

DETAILS.

Many wild horses abandoned, or simply not tamed, by the Nords of Skyrim litter the landscape. Some of them are the common species, from the palomino mares and stallions, to simple gray and black horses indigenous to the lands of Skyrim, and even a few rarer breeds, like the Dappled Black or the GrayBack are scattered high and low. Of course, hunted as food by bears and wolves, these horses are on the brink of extinction, but in the hardy way of most of the inhabitants of Skyrim, they struggle on.

Many characteristics of the wild horses are atypical. While, of course, the indigenous horses are prevalent, a few foreign breeds, mainly brought over by the Khajeet caravans (the dusty brownish types) and those that have wandered free still exist, dotted around, from place to place. Almost indistinguishable in build by now, they are able to survive, but those of true Nordic descent are still the superior horse.

CURRENTLY, WE ARE LOOKING FOR TEXTURE ARTISTS AND 3D DESIGNERS. IF YOU\'VE GOT WHAT IT TAKES, MESSAGE US. WE\'LL BACKLINK YOUR WORK ON THIS PAGE, IF YOU WISH.

CREDITS:
Grim219 (Lore)
xxzakthecoolxx (Lead developer)
HUGE THANK YOU TO DHEGONUS FOR THE TEXTURES.

V 1.3

Added four entirely new species of horse  
Improved texture quality of new species  
Made wild horses more afraid  
Horses no longer run at you from range to try and kick you to death  
Recorded positions of all horses  

V 1.0

Added 25 new wild horse herds, equal to around 130 horses  
Created six new species with separate attributes  
Made wild horses more aggressive than normal horses
author: xxzakthecoolxx

files.name: Wild Horses of Skyrim V1 series
